projects.name: Content-Based Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Designed and deployed a content-based recommendation tool using advanced natural language processing (NLP) techniques and machine learning models.

projects.name: Rain Prediction Model
projects.description: Created a rain prediction model using various classification algorithms, including Linear Regression, K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN), Decision Trees, Logistic Regression, and Support Vector Machines (SVM).

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis on Amazon Reviews
projects.description: Conducted sentiment analysis on Amazon reviews using machine learning techniques to classify customer feedback as positive, negative, or neutral.
